managedTopic.fullName: The Community at Illumina.Featured:New To NGS Forum
managedTopic.name: New To NGS Forum
managedTopic.topicDescription: Are you new to Next Generation Sequencing? Leverage your peers to earn more about the evolution of genomic science, major advances in sequencing technology, key methods, the basics of sequencing chemistry, and more.

managedTopic.name: General Topics
managedTopic.topicDescription: The Community at Illumina is a collaborative space where like-mindedÂ people can exchange ideas, solutions, tips, techniques, and information to support and empower each other. The General Topics forum is a place where members of the Community can ask general genomics related questions, share interesting articles and simply connect and engage with others in the sequencing space.
